org.spongepowered.api.item.recipe.smelting

Interface SmeltingRecipe.Builder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ResettableBuilder<SmeltingRecipe,SmeltingRecipe.Builder>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    SmeltingRecipe.Builder.EndStep, SmeltingRecipe.Builder.ResultStep
    Enclosing interface:
    SmeltingRecipe

    public static interface SmeltingRecipe.Builder
extends ResettableBuilder<SmeltingRecipe,SmeltingRecipe.Builder>
    Builds a simple furnace recipe.

    • Method Detail

      • ingredient

        SmeltingRecipe.Builder.ResultStep ingredient(Predicate<ItemStackSnapshot> ingredientPredicate,
                                             ItemStackSnapshot exemplaryIngredient)
        Changes the ingredient predicate and returns this builder. The ingredient predicate is the predicate which must return true in order for this recipe to be fulfilled.
        Parameters:
        ingredientPredicate - The ingredient predicate
        exemplaryIngredient - An exemplary ingredient
        Returns:
        This builder, for chaining

      • ingredient

        SmeltingRecipe.Builder.ResultStep ingredient(ItemStackSnapshot ingredient)
        Changes the ingredient predicate and returns this builder. The ingredient predicate is the predicate which must return true in order for this recipe to be fulfilled.

        The vanilla ItemStack matching behavior is used as the ingredient predicate.

        Parameters:
        ingredient - The required ingredient
        Returns:
        This builder, for chaining

      • ingredient

        default SmeltingRecipe.Builder.ResultStep ingredient(ItemStack ingredient)
        Changes the ingredient and returns this builder. The ingredient is the ItemStack required in order for the recipe to be fulfilled.
        Parameters:
        ingredient - The required ingredient
        Returns:
        This builder, for chaining
